text: Wilhelm Gegenfurtner is a German Roman Catholic priest. He was born in Teisnach, Lower Bavaria, and in 1974 became a Roman Catholic priest in the Roman Catholic Diocese of Regensburg. His work as a priest was at Geisenfeld, at the University of Regensburg. He was awarded the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany in August 2005. ==References== * Category:German Roman Catholic priests Category:Recipients of the Cross of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Wilhelm Gegenfurtner
